titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter relates to William Bruce's recent work in Shiraz, where he negotiated adjustments to the accounts of Mahomed Nebbe Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire]. Includes the following enclosure: a copy of a translation of a royal firmaun [firman] from the King of Persia [Fat'h Ali Shah Qajar], awarding Bruce the badge of the Order of the Lion and Sun.
